TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:
lemme try that

- - - Updated - - -

nope didn't work

use the search bar on your windows to find any modulemanager .dlls that are not placed in the main gamedata folder (probably in a subfolder from a mod).
nope still not working

You may want to go through that zip and re-place all of the objects before throwing it out there for folks. The cfg's I made were for 0.25/0.90 and are not going to work in 1.0.4 (stock or RSS). Even with RSS installed, the planet names have changed, meaning the objects will not know where to show up. Even if you go in and change all the references from Kerbin to Earth, the RSS terrain map has changed since 0.90, and they will float about 10m higher above the cape canaveral terrain, compared to where I placed them. Anyone who downloads the "BaconKSC2" in its current form is going to have to re-place the objects themselves using KK, stock or RSS.

There is a reason I never released this before on the forums.. it's far from being complete or streamlined

Edit:

PS: My SpaceX Barge model should be in that source folder as well. (noticed y'all talking about something like that a few pages back) But it still needs some detail added.

I would assume you reachrd your memory limit.
I fixed it

There is a reason I never released this before on the forums.. it's far from being complete or streamlined

That is what I am trying to get people to understand. They keep downloading the zip file expecting it to work and then post questions here as if your KSC2 is some kind of beta version of this mod. It is not even remotely ready yet.

Peoples of the interwebs, please don't mess around with the KSC2 unless you absolutely know what you are doing. I am working on getting it to function properly in 1.0.4, and it will be a part of Tristons mod as soon as we release the first version. Until then, please be patient
